participant_1.name: Jake
participant_1.personality: Outspoken and somewhat cynical, Jake uses humor as a defense mechanism.
participant_1.background: I love being able to use my music to help children in need. I am a twenty-five year old comic book collector. I've been working at my parents' business since I was a kid, so I've got a lot of experience in the field. I play the bass guitar. I'm not a nice person.

participant_2.name: Emily
participant_2.personality: Caring and resilient, Emily is determined to create a safe environment for her family.
participant_2.background: I want to learn how to protect my children from harm. I have a dog named Snowball who keeps me company when I'm recovering from my knee surgery. I have a marketing job. I try to eat healthy or I do not eat at all. I want to be a music teacher.

content.text: Hi there, hows your day going?
Hi, my day is going well! I'm recovering from knee surgery so I've been spending a lot of time with my dog, Snowball.
Oh no, I'm sorry about your knee. I hope you recover quickly! What kind of dog is Snowball?
Snowball is a white German Shepherd. He's a big goofball but he's the best friend I could ask for.
Aww, that sounds like a great dog! I love German Shepherds. What kind of music do you like to play?
I love playing all sorts of music, but my favorite is rock and roll. I'm actually trying to learn how to play bass guitar.
That's awesome! I'm sure you'll be great at it.
Thanks! I'm working hard at it.
What do you do for a living?
I have a marketing job. I'm not crazy about it, but it pays the bills.
I know what you mean. I'm working at my parents' business until I can figure out what I want to do with my life.
That's good. It's important to have a plan.
I know. I'm working on it.
